upgradeable pattern using OpenZeppelin's upgradeable contracts This contract serves as a bridge wrapper that: - Accepts bridged AMICA tokens and mints equivalent native AMICA tokens (wrap) - Burns native AMICA tokens and returns equivalent bridged AMICA tokens (unwrap) - Maintains security through reentrancy guards and pausability - Tracks total inflows and outflows for accounting and security purposes","errors":{"EnforcedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is paused."}],"ExpectedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is not paused."}],"InvalidInitialization()":[{"details":"The contract is already initialized."}],"NotInitializing()":[{"details":"The contract is not initializing."}],"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)"}],"OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address)":[{"details":"The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation."}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}]},"events":{"BridgeMetricsUpdated(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"netBridged":"Net amount currently bridged (in - Can only withdraw excess beyond (totalBridgedIn - totalBridgedOut) - This ensures user funds remain protected For other tokens: - Can withdraw any amount (useful for recovering accidentally sent tokens)","to":"The address to receive the withdrawn tokens","token":"The address of the token to withdraw"}},"initialize(address,address,address)":{"custom:requirement":"_bridgedAmicaToken must be a valid ERC20 token contract_nativeAmicaToken must implement IAmicaToken interfaceBoth token addresses must be different","details":"Can only be called once during deployment via proxy","params":{"_bridgedAmicaToken":"Address of the bridged AMICA token from Ethereum","_nativeAmicaToken":"Address of the native AMICA token on this chain","_owner":"Address that will own this contract"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"pause()":{"details":"Only callable by contract owner. Emergency function to halt operations. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. Can only be called by the current owner."},"unpause()":{"details":"Only callable by contract owner after operations have been paused"},"unwrap(uint256)":{"custom:emits":"TokensUnwrapped","custom:requirement":"User must have sufficient native token balanceUser must have approved native token for burningContract must have sufficient bridged tokens","details":"User must approve the native token contract to burn their tokens","params":{"amount":"The amount of native tokens to unwrap (must be greater than 0) Process: 1. Burns native tokens from user's balance 2. Transfers equivalent bridged tokens from contract to user 3. Updates total bridged out counter"}},"updateBridgeTokens(address,address)":{"custom:emits":"BridgeTokensUpdated","custom:requirement":"Contract must be paused before callingNew addresses must be non-zero and different from each other","custom:security":"Critical function - ensure proper governance/timelock controls","details":"Extremely sensitive function that should only be used in emergency scenarios such as token contract migrations or critical security updates","params":{"_bridgedAmicaToken":"New address for the bridged AMICA token","_nativeAmicaToken":"New address for the native AMICA token"}},"wrap(uint256)":{"custom:emits":"TokensWrapped","custom:requirement":"User must have sufficient bridged token balanceUser must have approved this contract for the amount","details":"User must approve this contract to spend their bridged tokens before calling","params":{"amount":"The amount of bridged tokens to wrap (must be greater than 0) Process: 1. Transfers bridged tokens from user to this contract 2. Mints equivalent amount of native tokens to user 3. Updates total bridged in counter"}}},"stateVariables":{"__gap":{"details":"Reserved storage space to allow for layout changes in the future. returns._0: The amount of bridged AMICA tokens in the contract

constructor.details: Prevents implementation contract from being initialized.

emergencyWithdraw(address,address,uint25.custom:callable-when-paused: Emergency function remains accessible when paused
emergencyWithdraw(address,address,uint25.custom:requirement: `to` cannot be zero addressFor bridged AMICA, amount cannot exceed excess balance
emergencyWithdraw(address,address,uint25.details: Can only withdraw non-AMICA tokens or excess AMICA tokens beyond what's owed to users

params.amount: The amount of tokens to withdraw For bridged AMICA tokens: - Can only withdraw excess beyond (totalBridgedIn - totalBridgedOut) - This ensures user funds remain protected For other tokens: - Can withdraw any amount (useful for recovering accidentally sent tokens)
params.to: The address to receive the withdrawn tokens
params.token: The address of the token to withdraw

initialize(address,address,address).custom:requirement: _bridgedAmicaToken must be a valid ERC20 token contract_nativeAmicaToken must implement IAmicaToken interfaceBoth token addresses must be different
initialize(address,address,address).details: Can only be called once during deployment via proxy

params._bridgedAmicaToken: Address of the bridged AMICA token from Ethereum
params._nativeAmicaToken: Address of the native AMICA token on this chain
params._owner: Address that will own this contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Only callable by contract owner. Emergency function to halt operations. Does not affect emergency withdrawal functionality.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Only callable by contract owner after operations have been paused

unwrap(uint256).custom:requirement: User must have sufficient native token balanceUser must have approved native token for burningContract must have sufficient bridged tokens
unwrap(uint256).details: User must approve the native token contract to burn their tokens

params.amount: The amount of native tokens to unwrap (must be greater than 0) Process: 1. Burns native tokens from user's balance 2. Transfers equivalent bridged tokens from contract to user 3. Updates total bridged out counter

updateBridgeTokens(address,address).custom:requirement: Contract must be paused before callingNew addresses must be non-zero and different from each other
updateBridgeTokens(address,address).custom:security: Critical function - ensure proper governance/timelock controls
updateBridgeTokens(address,address).details: Extremely sensitive function that should only be used in emergency scenarios such as token contract migrations or critical security updates

params._bridgedAmicaToken: New address for the bridged AMICA token
params._nativeAmicaToken: New address for the native AMICA token

wrap(uint256).custom:requirement: User must have sufficient bridged token balanceUser must have approved this contract for the amount
wrap(uint256).details: User must approve this contract to spend their bridged tokens before calling

params.amount: The amount of bridged tokens to wrap (must be greater than 0) Process: 1. Transfers bridged tokens from user to this contract 2. Mints equivalent amount of native tokens to user 3. Updates total bridged in counter

bridgedAmicaToken().notice: The ERC20 token representing bridged AMICA from Ethereum

bridgedBalance().notice: Returns the current balance of bridged tokens held by this contract

emergencyWithdraw(address,address,uint25.notice: Emergency function to recover tokens from the contract

nativeAmicaToken().notice: The native AMICA token contract on this chain with mint/burn capabilities

pause().notice: Pauses all wrap and unwrap operations

totalBridgedIn().notice: Total amount of bridged tokens that have been wrapped

totalBridgedOut().notice: Total amount of bridged tokens that have been unwrapped

unpause().notice: Resumes all wrap and unwrap operations

unwrap(uint256).notice: Unwraps native AMICA tokens to receive bridged AMICA tokens

updateBridgeTokens(address,address).notice: Updates the bridge token addresses (emergency migration function)

wrap(uint256).notice: Wraps bridged AMICA tokens to receive native AMICA tokens

@notice Burns tokens from the caller's balance
 @param amount The amount of tokens to burn

@title IAmicaToken
 @notice Interface for the native AMICA token with minting and burning capabilities
@notice The ERC20 token representing bridged AMICA from Ethereum
@notice The native AMICA token contract on this chain with mint/burn capabilities
@notice Total amount of bridged tokens that have been wrapped
@notice Total amount of bridged tokens that have been unwrapped

 This is a best practice for upgradeable contracts to prevent storage collision.

 @custom:oz-upgrades-unsafe-allow constructor

@notice Resumes all wrap and unwrap operations
 @dev Only callable by contract owner after operations have been paused

 @return The amount of bridged AMICA tokens in the contract
